document.full_text: lebron james would be more involved in the offense when the heat face the dallas mavericks in a critical game five of the nba finals, miami coach erik spoelstra said on wednesday.
document.title: spoelstra vows to get james back on track offensively
lines_and_colors: lebron james would be more involved in the offense when the heat face the dallas mavericks in a critical game five of the nba finals, miami coach erik spoelstra said on wednesday.
